mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO T_EQUIPMENT_LIMIT ( id, equipment_id, batch_no, high_voltage_sys_no, high_voltage_one_battery_no, low_voltage_sys_no, low_voltage_one_battery_no, one_battery_voltage_high, one_battery_voltage_low, high_temperature_sys_no, high_temperature_probe_no, high_temperature, low_temperature_sys_no, low_temperature_probe_no, low_temperature, voltage_difference, temperature_difference, collection_time, addtime ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{equipmentId} , #{batchNo} , #{highVoltageSysNo} , #{highVoltageOneBatteryNo} , #{lowVoltageSysNo} , #{lowVoltageOneBatteryNo} , #{oneBatteryVoltageHigh} , #{oneBatteryVoltageLow} , #{highTemperatureSysNo} , #{highTemperatureProbeNo} , #{highTemperature} , #{lowTemperatureSysNo} , #{lowTemperatureProbeNo} , #{lowTemperature} , #{voltageDifference} , #{temperatureDifference} , #{collectionTime} , #{addtime} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE T_EQUIPMENT_LIMIT
equipment_id = #{equipmentId} ,
batch_no = #{batchNo} ,
high_voltage_sys_no = #{highVoltageSysNo} ,
high_voltage_one_battery_no = #{highVoltageOneBatteryNo} ,
low_voltage_sys_no = #{lowVoltageSysNo} ,
low_voltage_one_battery_no = #{lowVoltageOneBatteryNo} ,
one_battery_voltage_high = #{oneBatteryVoltageHigh} ,
one_battery_voltage_low = #{oneBatteryVoltageLow} ,
high_temperature_sys_no = #{highTemperatureSysNo} ,
high_temperature_probe_no = #{highTemperatureProbeNo} ,
high_temperature = #{highTemperature} ,
low_temperature_sys_no = #{lowTemperatureSysNo} ,
low_temperature_probe_no = #{lowTemperatureProbeNo} ,
low_temperature = #{lowTemperature} ,
voltage_difference = #{voltageDifference} ,
temperature_difference = #{temperatureDifference} ,
collection_time = #{collectionTime} ,
addtime = #{addtime}
WHERE id = #{id}
